home.features.project.textline.message: Ha, there's even a new project over here.

home.features.project.desc.message: The Advanced Framework started on December 7, 2023, and was renamed from Advanced UI to Advanced Framework on January 7, 2024. The main inspiration comes from Genshin UI, which stopped updating on August 9, 2023.

home.features.modular.textline.message: Modules are made to be broken!

home.features.modular.desc.message: In order to separate the MMD renderer with the native library, the entire Mod is designed as multiple modules that can be independently loaded or embedded into the internal of other Mods.

home.features.mmdrenderer.textline.message: Renderer upgrade is done, Come test

home.features.mmdrenderer.desc.message: The implementation of the MMD renderer has been migrated from {mmdbase_link} to {saba_native_link}, without using the KAIMyEntity's code. As there is no direct manipulation of OpenGL cache to submit data, it enhances compatibility with Iris. However, it still causes performance and rendering issues.
